lead_paragraph: Ivan Basso won the 20th stage of the Giro d'Italia yesterday, virtually clinching the overall victory one day before the race ends. It was Basso's third stage victory. He raised a photo of his son, Santiago, who was born Friday, as he crossed the finish line. Basso covered the 131-mile route from Trento to Aprica, over the famed Gavia and Mortirolo passes, in 6 hour 51 minutes 15 seconds. He has a lead of 9:18 over José Gutierrez Cataluna in the overall standings.
